verses.ar: وَٱلذَّـٰرِيَٰتِ ذَرۡوٗا
verses.en: By those [winds] scattering [dust] dispersing

verses.ar: فَٱلۡحَٰمِلَٰتِ وِقۡرٗا
verses.en: And those [clouds] carrying a load [of water]

verses.ar: فَٱلۡجَٰرِيَٰتِ يُسۡرٗا
verses.en: And those [ships] sailing with ease

verses.ar: فَٱلۡمُقَسِّمَٰتِ أَمۡرًا
verses.en: And those [angels] apportioning [each] matter

verses.ar: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَصَادِقٞ
verses.en: Indeed, what you are promised is true

verses.ar: وَإِنَّ ٱلدِّينَ لَوَٰقِعٞ
verses.en: And indeed, the recompense is to occur

verses.ar: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلۡحُبُكِ
verses.en: By the heaven containing pathways

verses.ar: إِنَّكُمۡ لَفِي قَوۡلٖ مُّخۡتَلِفٖ
verses.en: Indeed, you are in differing speech

verses.ar: يُؤۡفَكُ عَنۡهُ مَنۡ أُفِكَ
verses.en: Deluded away from the Qur'an is he who is deluded

verses.ar: قُتِلَ ٱلۡخَرَّـٰصُونَ
verses.en: Destroyed are the falsifiers

verses.ar: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ فِي غَمۡرَةٖ سَاهُونَ
verses.en: Who are within a flood [of confusion] and heedless

verses.ar: يَسۡـَٔلُونَ أَيَّانَ يَوۡمُ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.en: They ask, "When is the Day of Recompense

verses.ar: يَوۡمَ هُمۡ عَلَى ٱلنَّارِ يُفۡتَنُونَ
verses.en: [It is] the Day they will be tormented over the Fire

verses.ar: ذُوقُواْ فِتۡنَتَكُمۡ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَ
verses.en: [And will be told], "Taste your torment. This is that for which you were impatient

verses.ar: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّـٰتٖ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.en: Indeed, the righteous will be among gardens and springs

verses.ar: ءَاخِذِينَ مَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَبۡلَ ذَٰلِكَ مُحۡسِنِينَ
verses.en: Accepting what their Lord has given them. Indeed, they were before that doers of good

verses.ar: كَانُواْ قَلِيلٗا مِّنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ مَا يَهۡجَعُونَ
verses.en: They used to sleep but little of the night

verses.ar: وَبِٱلۡأَسۡحَارِ هُمۡ يَسۡتَغۡفِرُونَ
verses.en: And in the hours before dawn they would ask forgiveness

verses.ar: وَفِيٓ أَمۡوَٰلِهِمۡ حَقّٞ لِّلسَّآئِلِ وَٱلۡمَحۡرُومِ
verses.en: And from their properties was [given] the right of the [needy] petitioner and the deprived

verses.ar: وَفِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ءَايَٰتٞ لِّلۡمُوقِنِينَ
verses.en: And on the earth are signs for the certain [in faith]

verses.ar: وَفِيٓ أَنفُسِكُمۡۚ أَفَلَا تُبۡصِرُونَ
verses.en: And in yourselves. Then will you not see

verses.ar: وَفِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ رِزۡقُكُمۡ وَمَا تُوعَدُونَ
verses.en: And in the heaven is your provision and whatever you are promised

verses.ar: فَوَرَبِّ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِنَّهُۥ لَحَقّٞ مِّثۡلَ مَآ أَنَّكُمۡ تَنطِقُونَ
verses.en: Then by the Lord of the heaven and earth, indeed, it is truth - just as [sure as] it is that you are speaking

verses.ar: هَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ضَيۡفِ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ ٱلۡمُكۡرَمِينَ
verses.en: Has there reached you the story of the honored guests of Abraham

verses.ar: إِذۡ دَخَلُواْ عَلَيۡهِ فَقَالُواْ سَلَٰمٗاۖ قَالَ سَلَٰمٞ قَوۡمٞ مُّنكَرُونَ
verses.en: When they entered upon him and said, "[We greet you with] peace." He answered, "[And upon you] peace, [you are] a people unknown

verses.ar: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِۦ فَجَآءَ بِعِجۡلٖ سَمِينٖ
verses.en: Then he went to his family and came with a fat [roasted] calf

verses.ar: فَقَرَّبَهُۥٓ إِلَيۡهِمۡ قَالَ أَلَا تَأۡكُلُونَ
verses.en: And placed it near them; he said, "Will you not eat

verses.ar: فَأَوۡجَسَ مِنۡهُمۡ خِيفَةٗۖ قَالُواْ لَا تَخَفۡۖ وَبَشَّرُوهُ بِغُلَٰمٍ عَلِيمٖ
verses.en: And he felt from them apprehension. They said, "Fear not," and gave him good tidings of a learned boy

verses.ar: فَأَقۡبَلَتِ ٱمۡرَأَتُهُۥ فِي صَرَّةٖ فَصَكَّتۡ وَجۡهَهَا وَقَالَتۡ عَجُوزٌ عَقِيمٞ
verses.en: And his wife approached with a cry [of alarm] and struck her face and said, "[I am] a barren old woman

verses.ar: قَالُواْ كَذَٰلِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ
verses.en: They said, "Thus has said your Lord; indeed, He is the Wise, the Knowing

verses.ar: ۞قَالَ فَمَا خَطۡبُكُمۡ أَيُّهَا ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ
verses.en: [Abraham] said, "Then what is your business [here], O messengers

verses.ar: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّآ أُرۡسِلۡنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوۡمٖ مُّجۡرِمِينَ
verses.en: They said, "Indeed, we have been sent to a people of criminals

verses.ar: لِنُرۡسِلَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ حِجَارَةٗ مِّن طِينٖ
verses.en: To send down upon them stones of clay

verses.ar: مُّسَوَّمَةً عِندَ رَبِّكَ لِلۡمُسۡرِفِينَ
verses.en: Marked in the presence of your Lord for the transgressors

verses.ar: فَأَخۡرَجۡنَا مَن كَانَ فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
verses.en: So We brought out whoever was in the cities of the believers

verses.ar: فَمَا وَجَدۡنَا فِيهَا غَيۡرَ بَيۡتٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ
verses.en: And We found not within them other than a [single] house of Muslims

verses.ar: وَتَرَكۡنَا فِيهَآ ءَايَةٗ لِّلَّذِينَ يَخَافُونَ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَلِيمَ
verses.en: And We left therein a sign for those who fear the painful punishment

verses.ar: وَفِي مُوسَىٰٓ إِذۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰهُ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ بِسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٖ
verses.en: And in Moses [was a sign], when We sent him to Pharaoh with clear authority

verses.ar: فَتَوَلَّىٰ بِرُكۡنِهِۦ وَقَالَ سَٰحِرٌ أَوۡ مَجۡنُونٞ
verses.en: But he turned away with his supporters and said," A magician or a madman

verses.ar: فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُ وَجُنُودَهُۥ فَنَبَذۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡيَمِّ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٞ
verses.en: So We took him and his soldiers and cast them into the sea, and he was blameworthy

verses.ar: وَفِي عَادٍ إِذۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلرِّيحَ ٱلۡعَقِيمَ
verses.en: And in 'Aad [was a sign], when We sent against them the barren wind

verses.ar: مَا تَذَرُ مِن شَيۡءٍ أَتَتۡ عَلَيۡهِ إِلَّا جَعَلَتۡهُ كَٱلرَّمِيمِ
verses.en: It left nothing of what it came upon but that it made it like disintegrated ruins

verses.ar: وَفِي ثَمُودَ إِذۡ قِيلَ لَهُمۡ تَمَتَّعُواْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٖ
verses.en: And in Thamud, when it was said to them, "Enjoy yourselves for a time

verses.ar: فَعَتَوۡاْ عَنۡ أَمۡرِ رَبِّهِمۡ فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلصَّـٰعِقَةُ وَهُمۡ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.en: But they were insolent toward the command of their Lord, so the thunderbolt seized them while they were looking on

verses.ar: فَمَا ٱسۡتَطَٰعُواْ مِن قِيَامٖ وَمَا كَانُواْ مُنتَصِرِينَ
verses.en: And they were unable to arise, nor could they defend themselves

verses.ar: وَقَوۡمَ نُوحٖ مِّن قَبۡلُۖ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَوۡمٗا فَٰسِقِينَ
verses.en: And [We destroyed] the people of Noah before; indeed, they were a people defiantly disobedient

verses.ar: وَٱلسَّمَآءَ بَنَيۡنَٰهَا بِأَيۡيْدٖ وَإِنَّا لَمُوسِعُونَ
verses.en: And the heaven We constructed with strength, and indeed, We are [its] expander

verses.ar: وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ فَرَشۡنَٰهَا فَنِعۡمَ ٱلۡمَٰهِدُونَ
verses.en: And the earth We have spread out, and excellent is the preparer

verses.ar: وَمِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٍ خَلَقۡنَا زَوۡجَيۡنِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.en: And of all things We created two mates; perhaps you will remember

verses.ar: فَفِرُّوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۖ إِنِّي لَكُم مِّنۡهُ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ
verses.en: So flee to Allah. Indeed, I am to you from Him a clear warner

verses.ar: وَلَا تَجۡعَلُواْ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَۖ إِنِّي لَكُم مِّنۡهُ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ
verses.en: And do not make [as equal] with Allah another deity. Indeed, I am to you from Him a clear warner

verses.ar: كَذَٰلِكَ مَآ أَتَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا قَالُواْ سَاحِرٌ أَوۡ مَجۡنُونٌ
verses.en: Similarly, there came not to those before them any messenger except that they said, "A magician or a madman

verses.ar: أَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِهِۦۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ قَوۡمٞ طَاغُونَ
verses.en: Did they suggest it to them? Rather, they [themselves] are a transgressing people

verses.ar: فَتَوَلَّ عَنۡهُمۡ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِمَلُومٖ
verses.en: So leave them, [O Muhammad], for you are not to be blamed

verses.ar: وَذَكِّرۡ فَإِنَّ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ تَنفَعُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
verses.en: And remind, for indeed, the reminder benefits the believers

verses.ar: وَمَا خَلَقۡتُ ٱلۡجِنَّ وَٱلۡإِنسَ إِلَّا لِيَعۡبُدُونِ
verses.en: And I did not create the jinn and mankind except to worship Me

verses.ar: مَآ أُرِيدُ مِنۡهُم مِّن رِّزۡقٖ وَمَآ أُرِيدُ أَن يُطۡعِمُونِ
verses.en: I do not want from them any provision, nor do I want them to feed Me

verses.ar: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلرَّزَّاقُ ذُو ٱلۡقُوَّةِ ٱلۡمَتِينُ
verses.en: Indeed, it is Allah who is the [continual] Provider, the firm possessor of strength

verses.ar: فَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ ذَنُوبٗا مِّثۡلَ ذَنُوبِ أَصۡحَٰبِهِمۡ فَلَا يَسۡتَعۡجِلُونِ
verses.en: And indeed, for those who have wronged is a portion [of punishment] like the portion of their predecessors, so let them not impatiently urge Me

verses.ar: فَوَيۡلٞ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِن يَوۡمِهِمُ ٱلَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ
verses.en: And woe to those who have disbelieved from their Day which they are promised
